__e: Got tired of living under Maurice's rules... killed him.
Maurice was the last person at the poker game, which means he was the last person to see Joe alive.
If you've been partying up in my place, Maurice, they better all be out.
Maurice doesn't want to believe it, you may not want to believe it, but that's the reality.
Well, y-you know, Maurice hasn't, uh, had work for a while.
Please, Maurice, I don't think of what I do as work.
